package.name: Net_GameServerQuery
package.summary: An interface to query and return information from a game server
package.description: Net_GameServerQuery provides an interface for querying game servers

release.notes: First release! This package is alpha, everything is likely to change.

The structure of the class has been completely changed, along with the API. The API is now relatively stable, though still subject to change.
Supports simultaneous querying of servers, so many servers can be queried relatively quickly.
The class now fetches all data from game servers, including rules, status, players and ping. Many protocols have been implemented, but still alpha quality.

Complete rework of the protocol parsing classes and associated methods. Significant useability improvements in the API. Massive speed improvements in parsing. Added support for protocols: - Doom3 - QuakeWorld - Quake3 - HalfLife - HalfLife2 - GameSpy - GameSpy04 - UnrealEngine2
